description: An amusing twist on electron negativity
title: Electron Vibes
n_1: Proton walks into a bar, spotting Electron
n_2: Electron rolls her eyes, sipping her drink
c1_2: Come on, lighten up a bit!
c2_2: Maybe if you stopped being so positive...
n_3: Proton laughs, trying to cheer her up
c1_3: Let's focus on the bright side!
c2_3: That's literally your job, not mine.
n_4: They banter back and forth, the bar buzzing
c1_4: Ever thought of switching your charge?
